column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Baking a cake is so much fun .
#text=I always love to buy the package from the grocery store since this is the easiest way .
#text=You just need to mix the package with some eggs and oil .
#text=First I would pre-heat the oven to about four hundred degrees .
#text=Then mix all the cake batter ingredients all together until the consistency of the cake mix is smooth and there are no chunks .
#text=Then I slowly pour the batter into a cake pan and ensure that the batter is even in the pan .
#text=Sometimes I use cooking spray to oil the pan and sometimes I forget but honestly I feel like it does not make that big of a difference .
#text=Then I cook the cake and wait until it is done .
#text=Sometimes I like to look through the window on the oven door and watch how the cake will rise in the cake pan .
#text=Then I love to smell the cake as the aroma fills the entire house , oh I love this part so much .
#text=Then the timer beeps and I am so happy .
#text=The most important part of baking a cake , as my mother always told me , is to turn off the oven when the cake is doing baking .
#text=I pull it out and use a toothpick to make sure that the cake is done by making sure that the toothpick comes out clean from the middle of the cake .
#text=Then I wait a while and then I mix together some frosting .
#text=I spread the frosting on the cake and cut myself a piece and I eat it !
